messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] Saitou Hajime Fanart
messages.msgSnippet: Just a note to say, I squealed like only obsessive geeks can over their objects of obsession! It s gorgeous! I love the atmosphere it conveys and the
messages.messageBody:
Just a note to say, I squealed like only obsessive
geeks can over their objects of obsession! It's
gorgeous! I love the atmosphere it conveys and the
expression on his face.

Best wishes,

Mio. (who's wondering who'll take fanart requests.)
(To any of those who are interested, the next chapter
of The Courtship of Lady Tokio is almost done, but due
to a family emergency, I'm back in Japan for a week.
Is anyone interested?)

--- genkigeeks <genkigeeks@...> wrote:

> My latest drawing, a tribute to Saito Hajime. This
> digital painting
> was based on a black-and-white manga-style drawing
> of Saito at the
> back of a doujinshi called Spark! (sadly, I don't
> know who the artist
> was). Even though it was simply a stark monochrome
> image, I was
> captivated. I just had to paint my own version of
> it.
>
> http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/37693516/
>
> The next drawing I'm working on is of Saitou in his
> Shinsengumi
> uniform (as he's seen in Rurouni Kenshin). I'm also
> thinking of making
> Souji Okita (Peacemaker Kurogane) art. ^_^
>
> Thank you for your time! I hope you enjoy my work!
>
>
>
>
>
>
>




___________________________________________________________
Yahoo! Messenger - with free PC-PC calling and photo sharing. http://uk.messenger.yahoo.com

messages.subject: Re: Saitou Hajime Fanart
messages.msgSnippet: Wow ~ this is really good. I am a huge fan of Saitô Hajime. The coloring and details of the picture are phenomenal. You are very good at digital painting. He
messages.messageBody:
Wow ~ this is really good. I am a huge fan of Saitô Hajime. The
coloring and details of the picture are phenomenal. You are very
good at digital painting.

He looks so lost in thought. He has a very far-away and reflective
pose to him.

Thank you for sharing and I look forward to your next picture.

Pugsley!!


__________________________________________________________________

Overall the art is incredibly elegant and very mature.

Thank you for sharing...this really made my day

messages.subject: Saitou Hajime Fanart
messages.msgSnippet: My latest drawing, a tribute to Saito Hajime. This digital painting was based on a black-and-white manga-style drawing of Saito at the back of a doujinshi
messages.messageBody:
My latest drawing, a tribute to Saito Hajime. This digital painting
was based on a black-and-white manga-style drawing of Saito at the
back of a doujinshi called Spark! (sadly, I don't know who the artist
was). Even though it was simply a stark monochrome image, I was
captivated. I just had to paint my own version of it.

http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/37693516/

The next drawing I'm working on is of Saitou in his Shinsengumi
uniform (as he's seen in Rurouni Kenshin). I'm also thinking of making
Souji Okita (Peacemaker Kurogane) art. ^_^

Thank you for your time! I hope you enjoy my work!
